attributes.action: stop promoting biofuels as an alternative to petroleum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Biofuels are not a valid replacement for petrol.

Planting the crops not only causes mass deforestation, it also displaces people. More importantly, its carbon footprint is actually higher than that of current fuels.

The government's plans intend to ensure  that by 2050 a third of the fuel used in Britain will be biofuel. The government uses this as indication that it is becoming more eco-friendly. The reality is that it is actually more destructive.

If Britain wants to combat global warming and climate change it cannot push the carbon cost on to the countries producing the fuels, the government's current retort to the fact biofuel is as a whole more damaging than oil. Global warming is, after all, global.

This petition requests that the Prime Minister acknowledge that biofuels are neither sustainable nor ecologically sound and stop promoting them in Parliament, and to the public, as being such.
